response.answer_text: Nothing is ever “free.” Freedom isn’t free. Is it possible to “reach” and obtain your goals and aspirations? No, but it gives you something to strive for. Are Politicians ever “completely honest” or completely “truthful”? Of course not. Any site you visit on the Web or internet is out to turn a profit (make money). It is why they are in business. (see commerce and free enterprise.) Free enterprise isn’t free. That’s why every screen you see has commercials on it. It’s why sites give you access only when you join and or register. (They sell your name and viewing history,,,,see “cookies.”) Free access to the Internet with a real fast connection “in your home”? Nope even that isn’t free. Someone always pays. In America you have free speech. That’s why there is so much of it. The worst Vice known to Man is “free.” it’s called “Advice.” You can get “free” DVDs and Music CD’s through the mail. You just go to a site, select your favorite Movie or Album and they send them to you “free.” Only $12.99 shipping and handling plus applicable State and Local Tax. Free is a word used a lot in advertisements. The call is “free.” (That means you get to talk with a salesman on the phone “for free.”) The only thing “free” is the word free which is why they use it so freely. Now that you are free of your naive expectations of something for nothing,,,,,you are free to go get a job and start paying like everyone else. Oh yeah,,,,the answer was free except for your time, the cost of your computer and the electricity used to power it.

Well it all depends because its actually possible to get free (unlimited) internet access on any ISP in the world because there are several ways to do that. When i say free internet i mean you getting access to the internet even when your simcard has zero data (0.00mb) and credit balance. They are different exploits that you can apply to circumvent around your ISP network to get free internet i.e you can use open ports on your ISP network, proxies or proxy servers, or even apply the use of a tunneling app to achieve the aim. I have written several tutorials on how you can easily achieve this. How to get free internet on any ISP in the world:Part2 How to get free browsing data and call credit on any ISP in the world using IMEI tweaks How to configure http Injector for free internet access Best internet Tunnelers for free Unlimited Internet Access Note: All the tutorials written are for educational purposes only. I wont be held responsible if you abuse the use.
